item.title: Git Based Negotiations - A Concept Piece
item.description: Yesterday, I was having a conversation with a fellow github lawyer about git-based contract negotiations (gitgotiations…?). Indeed, this has been on my mind for a while and was one of my motivating, longer term reasons for thinking that some kind of text-based legal document format was necessary. For the production of many documents, lawyers need not worry too much about what goes into repos as it is only the final version of the document which is shared publicly.
